alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Roane; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:34PM EDT until August 07 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR WIRT...NORTHWESTERN ROANE...NORTHEASTERN JACKSON AND SOUTH CENTRAL WOOD COUNTIES... At 233 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elizabeth, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Elizabeth, Ravenswood, Sandyville, Reedy, Cherry, Peewee, Walker, Palestine, Lucille, Greencastle, Creston, Morristown, Rockport, and Leroy. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio...and central, north central and northwestern West Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
